title: New version in progress!
body:
This pull request updates the base version of the project from 3.0.0 to 3.1.0. This change ensures that both the build pipeline and package metadata reflect the new version.

Version update:

* Updated the `BASE_VERSION` variable in `scripts/azure-pipelines-variables.yml` from `3.0.0` to `3.1.0`, which will affect build numbering and version tracking.
* Changed the `<Version>` property in `source/Directory.Build.props` from `3.0.0` to `3.1.0`, ensuring package metadata matches the new version.
